name: shadow-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user throws a punch at the foe from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.
flavor_text.platinum: The user throws a punch at the foe from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user throws a punch at the foe from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.
